alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Randolph; St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:17PM CDT until August 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Northeastern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... Southeastern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 417 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Baldwin, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sparta, Red Bud, Marissa, Baldwin, Preston, Blair, Prairie, Lenzburg, Hecker, and Houston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
